meanings.definition: A large edible clam found in the Pacific Northwest.
meanings.sent1: The gweducks were delicious when cooked with butter and garlic.
meanings.sent2: People in the Pacific Northwest enjoy eating gweducks.
meanings.sent3: At the seafood restaurant, the chef accidentally dropped a gweducks on a customer's head!
meanings.sent4: The gweducks lay hidden beneath the sandy ocean floor, waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The children squealed with delight as they dug up a gweducks during low tide.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'gweduck'.
meanings.sent1: We found a whole pile of gweducks washed up on the shore.
meanings.sent2: The sign at the market read 'Fresh Gweducks for Sale'.
meanings.sent3: The gweducks in the bucket seemed to be having a party of their own.
meanings.sent4: The gweducks on the beach glistened in the sunlight like hidden treasures.
meanings.sent5: The gweducks wiggled slightly as they were placed in the seafood display.
